section.title: Enhancing Your CentOS 5 Samba Server
section.para: In this part, you will learn how to update your system distribution with some common server administration components using two different methods. These updates require changes to the config-rpm and packages TLEs already in place in your samber-server.xml file.

Following the illustrations in this section, you can conditionally configure applications in your distribution, automate installation, create various install images, add business support required by the legal and software development departments and secure your system. All of these options utilize top-level elements that you include in your system definition file, samber-server.xml.
